articles.title: YouTube's plan to hide 'dislikes' is a sellout move that will harm users | News - Happy
articles.description: YouTube has announced that they are considering hiding the 'dislike' button counter, under the rationale it will protect "content creators".
articles.content: YouTube has announced that they have been exploring options to hide the ‘dislike’ button counter that currently appears on each video. This feature has been around since 2010, but has become of great… [+3179 chars]

articles.title: Now Twitter lets you add stickers and GIFs to fleets - Yahoo News Australia
